pr_title: Keep %{_prefix}/conf/vespa/default-env.txt even when uninstalling vespa-base rpm.

timeline.message:
Keep %{_prefix}/conf/vespa/default-env.txt even when uninstalling
vespa-base rpm.

Keep %{_prefix}/conf/vespa/default-env.txt even when uninstalling
vespa-base rpm.

timeline.bodyText: It's the rm -f that is temporary and should be removed in a while.  We want to permanently keep any pre-existing default-env.txt.
timeline.author: hakonhall
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -406,6 +406,17 @@ if [ $1 -eq 0 ]; then # this is an uninstallation
     ! getent group %{_vespa_group} >/dev/null || groupdel %{_vespa_group}
 %endif
 fi
+# Temporarily keep modifications to conf/vespa/default-env.txt across
